A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw this movie twice-- once on opening night and again a few nights after with some friends.  It's not bad for a Star Wars movie (a movie with a ton of expectation.) . But some of the dialogue is truly cringe-worthy and some of the story writing is baffling.  The entire middle of the movie was expendable and kind of boring.  That being said\, its a Star Wars movie.  So it is still a must-see.
